text: geubunkkeseo geudaedeul-ege geumjihasin geos-eun ojig jug-eun gogiwa piwa dwaejigogiwa hananim-i anin geos-ui ileum-eulo dosaldoen geos-ila. geuleona wonhaji anhjiman gangjedoen sanghwang-eseo gyeong-gyeleul neomji anhneundamyeon geuegeneun joega eobsnola. sillo hananimkkeseoneun neogeuleoi yongseohasineun jaaelousin bun-ila
